name: DailyBalance
0:
”Alexa, open daily balance”
”Alexa, ask daily balance what it is”
”Alexa, ask daily balance how it works”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily balance
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill is a companion to the DailyBalance app, and it allows you to add items or tasks to DailyBalance via the Alexa To-do list feature. Simply tell Alexa to add an item to your To-do list and it will automatically show up in DailyBalance instead. 
To learn more about DailyBalance please visit dailybalanceapp.com. 

PREREQUISITES: To use this skill, it is required that you have a DailyBalance account already set up. When you enable this skill you will need to link it to your DailyBalance account, so please have your DailyBalance account credentials ready and follow the linking steps provided by the Alexa app. Also be sure to grant read and write permissions for the lists. 

HOW TO USE: For example, say 'Alexa, add Call Vet to my To-do list'. The skill will add 'Call Vet' to DailyBalance and it will show up in your 'Incoming' folder in the DailyBalance app.

NOTE: This will effectively replace Alexa's built-in To-do list. Items will appear in the Alexa To-do list briefly but then will get marked as Completed. This is done so that there is no duplication of items in both Alexa To-do and DailyBalance.
